cyclegan_trainer Module¶

CycleganTrainer class uses Unpaired Image-to-Image Translation using Cycle-Consistent Adversarial Networks, which is originally proposed in this arXiv 1. Implemented trainer module uses this Git 2 code as reference work.

References¶

1

https://arxiv.org/abs/1703.10593

2

https://github.com/aitorzip/PyTorch-CycleGAN

CycleganTrainer class¶
